attributes.action: change the law to ensure that spouses and partners of sitting politicians who abuse their entitlement to tax-free taxpayer paid travel between their costituency and London are required to refund the entire cost - including the cost of any investigations, to the public purse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are, daily, reports found through the FOI of politicians and government minsters spouses and partners being allowed to abuse the rules and use taxpayers money to fund their extravagant lifestyles to extreme ends, while taxpayers themselves are finding they no longer have enough money to properly feed themselves nor keep warm, through higher prices hitting the consumer.  This is immoral misuse of taxpayer pounds and must be stopped.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
